summary: Damaged or defective items are eligible for a full refund within 30 days of delivery with photo evidence.
Change-of-mind returns are accepted within 14 days; items must be unused and in original packaging.
Refunds are processed to the original payment method within 5–7 business days after inspection.
Standard shipping ETA is 3–5 business days within the continental region.
Orders placed after 2pm local time ship the next business day.
Electronics include a 1-year limited warranty covering manufacturer defects.
We do not sell personal data; see the Privacy Policy for data rights and requests.
We accept major credit cards and PayPal; prepaid cards are not supported for subscriptions.
Price adjustments are honored within 7 days of purchase with proof of lower advertised price.
Live chat hours: Mon–Fri 9am–6pm local; responses within 24h outside those hours.
